description: Historical simulations driven by changes in CO2 concentration only as used in hist-all (histAll) experiment.
rationale: Together with histGHG simulations these simulations would allow the ratio of CO2-attributable to GHG-attributable warming to be estimated.

requirements.description: Historical, pre-industrial to present and near future
requirements.label: 1850-2020 171yrs

requirements.description: Impose historical concentrations of atmospheric Carbon Dioxide (CO2).
requirements.label: CO2Historical

requirements.description: An ensemble of at least three simulations
requirements.keywords: minimum 3, at least 3, ensemble, runs, simulations
requirements.label: MinimumThree

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
